channel.title: Captains Rcing. (level -70)
channel.description:
[img]http://siggy.draynor.net/goal/runecraft/91/Captain.gif[/img] [img]http://siggy.draynor.net/goal/runecraft/75/Captain.gif[/img]
[b][u][size=15pt]Latest News[/size][/u][/b] Welcome to the first news letter, here i will post about whats i has recently been doing. Just to save you reading the rest of the thread (Which is probably boring to most people) So on with the show. I've been doing laws lately and managed to get 2 levels today, i spent some time making 1,000 laws then i sold and got 3k essence, went to world 66 and let people run for me for 2k essence, then made another 1k laws myself. I'm really really wishing runecrafting was faster and i really hope i don't give up before 91. I'm really just waiting to get to level 75 so i can use a giant pouch, i really feel it will help me alot when law crafting. I estimate about another 100k law runes untill 75, so i will follow me plan and keep doing what i was doing and hopefully should be there in a month or two. thanks for reading and supporting. Oh also just updated the whole post a bit... may not like it but i find it easier to see stuff. thanks.
[b][u][size=15pt]Summary[/size][/u][/b] 0. - [i][b]Latest News[/i][/b] - Should have already read it lol. 1. - [i][b]Summary[/b][/i] - Hate to say it but you are reading it. 2. - [i][b]Introduction[/b][/i] - What i'm doing and why i'm doing it. 3. - [i][b]Current info [/b][/i] - Information on what level i am and when this was last updated. 4. - [i][b]Log[/b][/i] - Just a log and a blog of what ive been doing/crafting and how its been. 5. - [i][b]Pictures[/b][/i] - Some pictures for your hungry eyes to feast on. 6. - [i][b]Side goals[/b][/i] - A little about what other things i'd like to achieve.
[b][u][size=15pt]Introduction[/size][/u][/b] So i decided to get 91 rcing, no easy task at all, and it will take me more then a few months. Well to be honest i wont be playing runescape much at all because of school and my gf but i really want 91 runecrafting. So I thought why not post it and then people can follow my progress. So here goes:
[b][u][size=15pt]Current info[/size][/u][/b] Starting date: [b]28/4/07[/b] Last update: [b]23/6/07[/b] Current level: [b]70[/b] Making: [b]laws in world 66[/b]
[b][u][size=15pt]Log[/size][/u][/b] [b][u]Day One[/u][/b] Level [u]1-14[/u] Had a hard start, couldnt find anyone anywhere selling a air tiara, finally found someone who made me pay 10k for one! Eventually purchased 3,000 ess and got down to crafting some airs, was quite easy to make it to 14 but i called it a night after i'd gotten to fire crafting stage. [b][u]Day Two[/u][/b] Level [u]14-42[/u] Had an early start, wasn't on for long as i had a date with the missus planned. So first i spent a while purchasing [b]1060[/b] Rings of duelings. I then began crafting fires, the leveling came pretty quick and i enjoy doing it this way: First you teleport to al karid with all your essence and your tiara and a ring, craft the fires, then teleport to castle wars and bank then do it all again. This method is very fast but sometimes tedious (but isnt all runecrafting?). Eventually got into the swing of crafting fires and got a good 28 levels, although these levels are easy i know that its going to get a lot harder soon. [b][u]Day Three[/u][/b] Level [u]42-45[/u] Had school on this day so i had a quick rc in the morning, got down to less then 1,000 dueling rings which i think is a good achievement, hopefully will get on rs when i get home and get to at least 44 runecrafting. Got home and got a few levels... can now craft nats and have planned to go get some pouches from the abyss tomorow, for tonight i need sleep. Got 1000 deaths to use up on abyssal creatures, damnit i hate doing the stupid quest for the dude. [b][u]Day Four[/u][/b] Level [u]45-47[/u] Completed Rune Mysteries quest and then got on to the sub quest for the zammy mage. Eventually after alot of confusion i got that finished and got me a small medium and large pouch from the abyss. Eventually got back to crafting some airs, Crafted 35 per trip which is up from 26. I also found out that you dont have to have the Ring of Duelings un equiped to use them, which saved me another space. At this point i would like to say, Dont be discouraged to using the abyss if your combat is low, my combat is only 40 and i easily got my pouches from the abyss. Eventually got 2 levels :) [b][u]Random Training[/u][/b] level [u]47-50[/u] Last few days been busy and havent updated this guide lately, just been coming on in the evenings after school and doing a few runs then coming off. Got to 50 at last though, make 86 fires a run now so things should get easier. So far the hardest part is buying the essence, just nobody on the forums sells regular essence, and you would have thought in the free world at varrock east would be a better bet, well it is but there is usually nobody there selling it... and if there is they hapen to be selling 28 of the essence unnoted. [b][u]Random Training+[/u][/b] level [u]50-51[/u] Still havent found much time to update this thread, but i'll post the basics, basically having 8 hours a day at school leaves me with no time to play rs, but im playing now and again when ever i can. I would like to say in this guide that when i leveled to 50 and got to use a large pouch, which holds 9 essence, it just made fire crafting alot faster for me, i dont know why but in my opinion it just feels so much fast, i cant wait untill level 75+ then i can use a giant pouch, now that is going to be cool, so yeah gotta go to school now, hope you enjoy following the rest of my guide when its here. [b][u]Random Training++[/u][/b] level [u]51-54[/u] Well it took me quite a while to get to 54, i havent really been playing much at all, just thought its a friday night and i'd give it the last push to 54...and i got it :) Shall be doing the quest to get a law talisman soon, and then perhaps i'll be trying crafting them for a while. But if that doesnt go well then it will be back to fire training for me. - Managed to complete troll stronghold (the quest needed to make laws), this quest includes beating a level 101 and a lvl 113, i managed to find a safe spot for each and finished the quest only losing about 100 deaths and about 6 monkfish. Was a good day. - I had a spare 1k pure essence in the bank so i thought why not craft them into laws.. well i did and it took me a good few days and with the extra money i bought 10k essence off of rictoo. Am now back to making fires again. I must say i prefer crafting fires soo much. [b][u]The law years[/u][/b] level [u]55-58[/u] Can't believe how busy i've been with real life, i suppose thats good but i really haven't had any time to play runescape. I've worked out a route to 75 runecrafting and it goes like so: Buy 1k ess, craft it into laws (by going to alter, crafting then teleporting to draynor) then after ive made the laws i will sell for 350k and buy 3k essence, use 2k of the essence at world 66 (fast free laws) and have people run me the 2k essence, then i go and craft another 1k laws from the essence i have left (rinse and repeat) And they were all blissfully, blissfully happy.
[b][u][size=15pt]Pictues!!![/size][/u][/b] 1= Getting 52 runecrafting 2= Nat crafting! 3= My gear that i use to rc. [IMG]http://i125.photobucket.com/albums/p80/davidude36/52rc.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i125.photobucket.com/albums/p80/davidude36/44rc2.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i125.photobucket.com/albums/p80/davidude36/captain1.jpg[/img]
[b][u][size=15pt]Side Goals[/size][/u][/b] Ok so i just quickyl will write this out, some of the side goals i wish to achieve: My perfect suit: Full black dhide (70 range) Boots of lightness (42 thieving) spottier cape (66 hunting) 47 construction (so i can use house teleport and teleport to edgeville, when crafting using the abyss).
[size=25pt]attention epic win by casey, he donated 3k regular essence. Second attention! EPIC WIN BY MR CHRIS, he kindly donated 220k gp to me =) shall be well spent on pure essence![/size]
